metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35475 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In MediaWiki before 1.35.1, the messages userrights-expiry-current anduserrights-expiry-none can contain raw HTML. XSS can happen when a uservisits Special:UserRights but does not have rights to change alluserrights, and the table on the left side has unchangeable groups in it.(The right column with the changeable groups is not affected and is escapedcorrectly.)

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
